front.title: Application Bridging for Federation Beyond the Web (ABFAB) Trust Router Protocol

abstract.t: A Trust Router is an infrastucture element used to construct multihop Application Bridging for Federated Authentication Beyond the Web (ABFAB) federations, as discussed in draft-mrw-abfab-multihop-fed-01.txt. This document defines both the Trust Router Protocol and the Trust Path Query, as discussed in the multihop federation document.
